Alias.name: (?:ptar|ptarget|partytarget) toggle
Alias.script: if partytargetting then partytargetting = false cecho("\n<white:DarkViolet>Party targetting <red:DarkViolet>disabled!!! <white:DarkViolet>Party targetting <red:DarkViolet>disabled!!! <white:DarkViolet>Party targetting <red:DarkViolet>disabled!!!") else partytargetting = true send("pt I am now following the targets of "..partytargetcaller) cecho("\n<white:DarkViolet>Party targetting <green:DarkViolet>enabled! <white:DarkViolet>Following party target caller! Party targetting <green:DarkViolet>enabled!") end
